title: Baked sweet potato with easy black beans and purple slaw
description: Soft, sweet potato is balanced with spiced savoury black beans in this easy, healthy meal for one.
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato (about 350g/12oz), washed and dried
100ml/3½fl oz vegetable stock, from a cube
salt and freshly ground black pepper
¼ small red cabbage, thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
